title: The First Singers
description: THIS BOOK IS (HOPEFULLY) TEMPORARILY UNAVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE. PLEASE, BEAR WITH ME WHILE I'M LOOKING FOR A NEW PUBLISHER. In the far future, Teena is ready to celebrate her eighteenth birthday by running for her life. Up to this day she lived in a former military base in the middle of an old, desolated city. Today will decide if she will join the fabled Survivor Island or if she will be killed by her former friends.
author: Kat Doughty
